main event: An observation of a red flame-like object in the sky over Kodiak, Alaska, on July 7, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as a red flame approximately 40 degrees long,The sighting lasted for about 1 second,It was noted to be moving horizontally and quietly,The object was at an altitude of about 500 yards with very fast horizontal velocity,No burning effect or sound was noted during the sighting.
sighted object: a red flame in the sky
witness description: a civilian who reported the sighting
